pkgmetadata.longdescription: # html2docxhtml2docx converts valid HTML input to docx output. The project is distributedunder the MIT license.## InstallingTo install, use pip:```$ pip install html2docx```## Usage```pyfrom html2docx import html2docxwith open("my.html") as fp: html = fp.read()# html2docx() returns an io.BytesIO() object. The HTML must be valid.buf = html2docx(html, title="My Document")with open("my.docx", "wb") as fp: fp.write(buf.getvalue())```## TestingTo run the test suite, use tox:```$ tox```
